summary:
ISSUES
Critical:
- The "How It Works" page failed the web performance test. It is crucial to investigate and resolve the issues causing this failure to ensure optimal user experience.
insights: The homepage, pricing page, and blog page have good load times, indicating efficient optimization and resource management.
The "How It Works" page failed the test, suggesting possible issues such as inefficient code, large media files, or slow server response times.
Investigating and addressing the issues on the "How It Works" page should be a priority to ensure consistent performance across all pages.
